001package tictactoe;
002
003/**
004 * Represents an immutable pair of moves
005 * made by the human player and the computer.
006 * 
007 * @author Tapio Malmberg
008 */
009class MovePair {
010    /**
011     * The Coordinate of the move the player has made.
012     */
013    public final Coordinate playerMove;
014    
015    /**
016     * The Coordinate of the move the computer has made.
017     */
018    public final Coordinate computerMove;
019
020    /**
021     * Creates a new MovePair with the two given Coordinates.
022     * @param playerMove the Coordinate of the move the player has made
023     * @param computerMove the Coordinate of the move the computer has made
024     */
025    public MovePair(Coordinate playerMove, Coordinate computerMove) {
026        this.playerMove = playerMove;
027        this.computerMove = computerMove;
028    }
029}
